Name: Raspberry Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with 1/2 scoop (6oz) crushed ice and serve in chilled glass.
Review: A crowd-pleasing, slightly sweet blended fruity Daiquiri.
Nutrition: One serving of Raspberry Daiquiri contains 259 calories
